nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
### 1. First Block: scrape the page to extract all the legislative procedures scheduled for debate yesterday
This workflow sends an HTTP request to collect the HTML of the page by block. For each block we extract the information of the procedures: **Reference Number**. **Committee**, **Rapporteur**, **Title/Description**, **PDF Link**.

#### How to setup?
*Nothing to do*

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Extract HTML Blocks
nodes.notes: This html node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Parse Blocks
nodes.notes: This html node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
### 2. Use a LLM to keep only the procedures related to sustainability
We loop though all items parsed and we provide the description and the committee to a LLM (Open AI). The LLM will use these information to assess if the procedure is related to **sustainability** or not.

#### How to setup?

- **Open AI Node**:
   1. Add the required credentials Open AI credentials and select the model *(Example: Open AI 4o-mini)*
   2. Adapt the system prompt with the topic you want to filter out or keep.
  [Learn more about the AI Agent Node]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
### 3. Topics related to sustainability are stored in a Google Sheet
The output of the LLM is combined with the other fields. A IF node filters out all the procedure not related to sustainability. The remaining items are loaded in a Google Sheet.

#### How to setup?

- **Record outputs in the Google Sheet Node**:
   1. Add your Google Sheet API credentials to access the Google Sheet file
   2. Select the file using the list, an URL or an ID
   3. Select the sheet in which you want to record your working sessions
   4. Map the fields: **Reference Number**. **Committee**, **Rapporteur**, **Title/Description**, **PDF Link**
  [Learn more about the Google Sheet Node]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Google Tasks
nodes.notes: This googleTasks node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content:
### 4. Create Sustainability Study Task
Create a Google Task for each EU legislative file related to sustainability, scheduled for tomorrow at 09:00 AM.
#### How to setup?

- **Add a task in Google Task**:
   1. Add your Google Task API credentials to access your task list
   2. Change the Task List name
  [Learn more about the Google Task Node]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Splitinbatches Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Splitinbatches Workflow. This workflow integrates 12 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, googleTasks, merge, set. It contains 22 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 22
- **Node Types**: 12
- **Error Handling**: âœ… Implemented
- **Security**: âœ… Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: âœ… Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Loop Over Items**: splitInBatches
- **Merge**: merge
- **If Node**: if
- **Extract Yesterday Records**: httpRequest
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Extract HTML Blocks**: html
- **Parse Blocks**: html
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note2**: stickyNote
- **Google Tasks**: googleTasks
- ... and 12 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
